title: Under Armour 's total workforce worldwide from 2009 to 2019
summary: Overall Number of employees has increased over the Year.
Number of employees is slightly increasing from 2010 to 2011, roughly constant from 2011 to 2012, and finally gradually increasing from 2012 to 2015.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2013 and 2014.
The highest Number of employees, of value 13400.0 was reached at Year 2015
The lowest Number of employees, of value 3900.0 was reported at Year 2010
